title: Stuck at 60 FPS after 7.9 Patch on MAC?
body:
After updating to the 7.9 Patch today, my FPS has been stuck at 60, whereas prior to this update, it was uncapped and getting upwards of 150-200 FPS. I really wouldn't care but I am experiencing mouse lag and intermittent game lag which makes it very difficult to CS and play the game. I have double checked all my in-game settings (all low), FPS is set to uncapped, and the anti-alysing and such is off, I have restarted the client and my computer several times, and I have performed a 'full-repair' without anything seeming to help.

Is anyone else experiencing these issues and any thoughts on how to fix this? Again, patches 7.8 and prior everything was running perfectly and without issues.

*UPDATE AS OF 640PM EASTERN TIME. I have found a TEMPORARY FIX for the lagging issues people might be experiencing on Mac/Apple products. It seems that the FULL SCREEN mode is causing the lag/sluggish gameplay since patch 7.9. When I switched to BORDERLESS window mode, my FPS was still stuck at 60 FPS, no matter what setting I left the FPS at, BUTTTT, any lag/sluggish gameplay was ELIMINATED. Therefore, if you do not mind playing in the borderless window mode, Mac/Apple users may once again resume playing at the high quality gameplay as was the case prior to patch 7.9. Will let you know if I find anything else out throughout the day/tomorrow.

replies.body:
>** Update 5/3/2017 @ 3:40 PM Pacfic**
> 
> Thanks everyone!  This issue is officially under investigation.  We'll provide updates and more info as they come in.

I appreciate the  reports and details here, guys.  We want to take a closer look into this, but need to get some logs to investigate.  If you're a mac player experiencing this 60 fps cap:

-  Download the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to obtain contexual and r3dlogs.  
-  Reach out to our tech team through a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and attach your logs.

This will help us figure out if something's going on as well as track the issue.  Thanks fam!
I have downloaded the hextech repair tool, obtained the logs and filed a support ticket with the logs and a somewhat thorough description. Please let me know if I can do anything else.

*******UPDATE AS OF 640PM EASTERN TIME. I have found a TEMPORARY FIX for the lagging issues people might be experiencing on Mac/Apple products. It seems that the FULL SCREEN  mode is causing the lag/sluggish gameplay since patch 7.9. When I switched to BORDERLESS window mode, my FPS was still stuck at 60 FPS, no matter what setting I left the FPS at, BUTTTT, any lag/sluggish gameplay was ELIMINATED. Therefore, if you do not mind playing in the borderless window mode, Mac/Apple users may once again resume playing at the high quality gameplay as was the case prior to patch 7.9. Will let you know if I find anything else out throughout the day/tomorrow.

PLEASE UPVOTE THIS SO MORE PEOPLE CAN SEE THIS FIX :)

When I switched to BORDERLESS window mode, my FPS was still stuck at 60 FPS, no matter what setting I left the FPS at, BUTTTT, any lag/sluggish gameplay was ELIMINATED. Therefore, if you do not mind playing in the borderless window mode, Mac/Apple users may once again resume playing at the high quality gameplay as was the case prior to patch 7.9. Will let you know if I find anything else out throughout the day/tomorrow.

this worked for me and got me from 30 fps to 60fps.....

Macbook pro - Yosemite

I've seen some reports about this throughout the morning, but I don't have enough information to determine if this is something more widespread.  Honestly, you can run into fps issues after a patch because you can run into issues like bad game files.  To help rule out some possibilities, go over each step of the [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide.  Test it in a custom game, and let me know if that fixed things up!
I went from capped 120fps without any drops (200 uncapped) to 60fps with drops to 20fps, I usually play at max settings without shadows. Playing at the lowest setting doesn't make any difference.
Hey! I tried everything in that guide, but my FPS is still stuck at 30 every game in this patch. Prior it was always above 90.

Thanks for the info and going through those steps.  For your specific case, download the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to grab some more logs for context.  Attach them in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our tech team can take a look and track this.  We'll help you out and see if there might be anything more going on too!
Hey Porocles! Since I have windows on my macbook pro, I tried downloading league on the windows, and surprisingly the FPS returned to 150. Apparently the slow FPS only happens on the mac version.

***Update as as 2pm. I have reinstalled the game, tried several different resolutions as well and still have a laggy, 60 or less FPS gameplay. Seems that no matter what is done, it doesn't improve the FPS and laggy play. I'll submit some logs and hopefully that might help :(.

Redownloading the game right now. Will let you know if this helps once its complete. Furthermore, will follow the FPS issues guide to see if that corrects the new 7.9 issues with MAC. Everything I've tried thus far (over the past 4 hours) have been unsuccessful with restoring FPS/quality of play.
Riot please.... its been 3 days....
riot is so slow to fix important issues....
Same problem , please help !
Good to see that other people are having problems with this too, I cant find anyway to uncap the framerate.
Bump i think a majority of mac users are having this problem, i am too. Borderless sort of fixes it.

I'm having the same issue fps stays stuck at 30 and will drop to 20 in fights... worst thing can't log a ticket either :( Given how prevalent macs are for personal use can you guys at riot please please please put as much effort into the patches for mac users as for windows? The game is becoming unplayable at this rate... Thank you - one frustrated girl gamer x.

Same thing happening here. FPS at 60, check all my settings (everything on "VERY LOW"), still could not solve the problem. 

I have also experienced in game lag and such as if I am playing at 30-40 ping. (Shows 8 Ping top right corner though).

All these problems came up right after updating to 7.9.

> [{quoted}](name=Aystoria,realm=OCE,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=AAlARqbb,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-05-03T16:19:19.844+0000)
>
> Same thing happening here. FPS at 60, check all my settings (everything on "VERY LOW"), still could not solve the problem. 
> 
> I have also experienced in game lag and such as if I am playing at 30-40 ping. (Shows 8 Ping top right corner though).
> 
> All these problems came up right after updating to 7.9.

Hi there. Are you also on a Mac?

I have this problem as well; stuck at 60 FPS on a Mac. I usually have 150+ FPS on "Very High" graphics and I cannot get it over 60 FPS now no matter what. Also the game feels different, kinda sluggish when moving screen etc. I also just made a post in this forum.
Yes, I am using a Mac! I know right, it just feels like somethings not right, seems not as "sensitive"...? I am sure Riot will look into this.
Yes exactly this. Feels like something is not right even though I can't say for sure what it is besides this sluggish feeling. It does not feel like low frame rate.
Pls spam tickets, need to make them work!

Having the same 60 FPS problem with FPS drop on full-screen.
When I change to borderless the lag problem is corrected, but the game show only in the middle of the screen with a border like 3 cm in each side of the game screen.
My FPS also start to goes down a little bit along the game (more in-game time, more FPS drop), I start with FPS stuck in 60 end finish the game with 38~40.
Anyone with similar problems?
any update yet ? macbook pro
Lol my client is at 60fps at its best mine after the update is 20fps 24/7 just got a free loss on my account cuz i couldnt even play shit was giving my a headache tryna play the game

As of patch 7.9 I'm having the same issue, my framerate is capped at 60, and usually I get 150-250 frames. I'm using a macbook pro 2016 15inch with macos sierra. I'm experiencing a great deal of screen tearing, and stutterness.

Same problem, and I am on mac as well. I ran the hextech repair tool, and sent a ticket along with my logs yesterday night, still waiting on  a response. Glad to know this is widespread on not just me. It immediately happened after the 7.9 update. Before the update I was running leagues on medium-high settings, with vsync off getting steady 150+fps throughout games. It was beautiful, and know its hard-capped at 60 and drops randomly through-out games to where it stutters and freezes briefly in crucial moments. I have done 2 fresh Re-install's, tried changing settings all the way down to lowest, tried windowed and borderless modes, nothing. It stays hard capped at 60. Very frustrating, I hope they can fix this soon. 

Just wanted to add, aside from the fps drop, my league client has experienced some glitchy behavior. For example whenever i enter my password to log in, after it passes through, a quick image of what you see when you receive a key(for loot & crafting)  pops up, then disappears. Also whenever I am in champ select, the client glitches/blinks randomly; like a quick refresh glitch. tends to happen more when I have my masteries page up, the lol client flickers. 

2.6GHz quad-core Intel Core i7 processor (Turbo Boost up to 3.6GHz) with 6MB L3 cache
8GB of 1600MHz DDR3 memory
NVIDIA GeForce GT 650M with 1GB of GDDR5 memory
I have the exact same issue
SAME PROBLEM HERE!!
Same problem

Also having the same problem after updating to 7.9. Was running at a solid 120fps before and now I won't even go a frame higher than 60 fps. I'll send the log with the hextech tool. Hope it gets fixed soon! (maybe we'll get some free RP?? ^_^)
Have received assistance from Riot tech support, the issue is apparently  on their end and will be looked into, all we can do is wait.
Having the same issue.Before this patch i used to run the game at 120 fps +- and now its caped at 60 fps but decreases constantly to 40 fps or lower. Pls try to solve it!

I have the same issue but on a Windows PC, not a mac. Usually get 150 - 200fps straight after update stuck on 60 which drops to 30 in team fights.

A few people had an issue with a windows update and turning off the DVR on the xbox app seemed to fix it. I did that and it temporarily fixed the issue, but there is still significant fps drop in team fights, makes it very hard to play
Same problem here.. I usually stream league around 190 fps, Very high everything, After patch i'm stuck at 60 fps with drops too 30 on Very Low Quality...

Link for the hextech repair tool won't work for me, can't click on the "Download for Mac" link. Long story short, i am also experiencing a locked 60fps after the new patch, tried lowering settings in every way but no change.

Weird, I was able to select it without issue unless you have a setting preventing you from unzipping files.  No worries, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we can collect these logs manually.  It will require some legwork!

I had the same problem at first, being unable to click the download buttons. I found out if I refreshed the page and clicked the button quickly enough afterwards, I could actually click it and download. It may be a Safari issue? Try another browser if you havn't.
Having the exact same issue, made a few posts earlier
omg, afters today patch its even worse.
Same problem here, playing on a MacBook Pro (Retina, 15-inch, Mid 2014), and my fps won't go higher than 60 FPS since the 7.9 update :(. Had 120+ before

I have the same problem, and lolreplay ms predict and wifispeed test shows my ms is very good but in game its stuck at 220??? And fps stuck at 60! Before this fps was always 150-200, im a windows user so please dont think it's just a Mac problem! I wrote my final masters exam yesterday, so haven't played in over a week, now I come back to this...
having the same problem. please help RIOT. Mac.
yes plz x)
Windows btw

i have the same problem !!!, i've create a forum lol in french to see if i was alone.. IM NOT, do you have the problem when u do cmd tab in game, there are a superposition with lol and ur page internet etc and when u come again in the game after do cmd tab ur FPS are normal 1 or 2 sec before been stuck at 30 or 60 ??

PLZ RIOT FIX THAT BUG x)

version mac os will change nth guy, i test that bug with my 3 mac and all the 3 have that problem !! with version 10.9 ; 10.11 ; 10.10 and i install sierra, the new version 10.12 and there are the same problem !!
Hi, same problem here on OS X, since I installed the newest patch !!
